COMMITTEE ON SCIENTIFIC AIDS TO LEARNING
*A COMMITTEE OF NATIONAL RESEARCH COUNCIL
41 EAST 42ND STREET, NEW YORK, N.Y.
James B. Conant, Chairman
Vannevar Bush

Frank B. Jewett
Bethuel M. Webster
Ben D. Wood
Irvin Stewart, Director
Telephone: Murray Hill 2-8352
November 14, 1939
Mr. Frank E. Schooley
Station YfILL
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Schooley:
Please accept my thanks for your letter of
November 7 commenting on the report on "Sound Recording
Equipment for Schools‚Äù.
I am relaying your comments to Professor
Van Dyke in order that he may have them before him as he
revises the report for publication.
Sincerely yours
Irvin Stewart
Director
